response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be worth every penny to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This price reflects my commitment to ensuring you receive a fair deal while also maximizing the value I receive for such an important item. I look forward to hearing your response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can enhance your experience.", "product_price": 9500}
